title: Tokubetsu Jugyou 2 (Private Sessions 2)
synopsis: The College of Sacred Maidens is bubbling over with sexy young ladies perfectly suited for Tomoya's lusts. So, when he crosses paths with a new student professor for the college, he's not about to let his chance pass by - he wastes no time drugging the guy, and taking his place. Now this dangerous sex fiend is surrounded by beautiful, buxom women... and he's already got a lot of "assignments" planned for them.
